duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and train protector teams to provide protection and logistical support at clients' homes and when they travel.
Harness GDBA's mission essential resources and protect clients in a variety of challenging circumstances.
Detect and defeat adversaries to ensure the safety, privacy, and wellbeing of clients.
Create and maintain readiness to meet any threat and survey and prepare locations prior to the arrival of the protected person.
Coordinate and execute plans for security and medical emergencies.

education_certification.credential: At least 5 years of Protection experience at the highest level of performance and client expectation.
